title: Pre-Void Kassadin Visual Bug

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Randomly his right arm weapon will disappear.

replies.body:
It happens after respawning I believe? I'll try recreate and update, but it happened every so often throughout the game.

Also you're one of my favorite rioters! XD

Hey Midlane Expert,

Do you happen to have any more information/steps to reproduce this? I've loaded him up in game, and I'm unable to get his weapon to disappear.
